metadata.synopsis: There are different debtors in House of Hope: they are all indebted to Raphael, and their souls are sold. Now these debtors are residing in House of Hope. This is a Skeleton Debtor, who's busy with different routine tasks in the Archive.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Talk to the skeletonteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_SkeletonDebtor01

0.speaker: Librarian Eternal Debtor
0.text: I cleanse the books. I comb each and every line for falsehoods and purge them pure.

1.speaker: Librarian Eternal Debtor
1.text: I will make them perfect! Pages crisp with lines and letters. I will make them beautiful for him, I promise. I promise.
1.context: NodeContext: Impassioned and slightly panicky that his work won't be enough
